cfg.name: google_news_tab
cfg.table_extract_meta: <extract> <row exact="1"> <webctrl tag='div' class='g'/> </row> <column exact='1' name='full_text_url' attr='href' name2='title' attr2='text'> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="h3" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="a" idx="1"/> </column> <column exact='1' name='channel_in_site' attr='text'> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="span" idx="1"/> </column> <column exact='1' name='publish_time' attr='text'> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="span" idx="3"/> </column> <column exact='1' name='abstract' attr='text'> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="div" idx="1"/> <webctrl tag="div" class="st" idx="1"/> </column> </extract>
